pages.text: This is boiler .$(br)It's used to warm up rooms in your house. It requires hot fuel in order to work. By default boiler emit heat when powered by redstone.
This is icebox .$(br)It's used to cool down rooms in your house. It requires cold fuel in order to work. By default icebox emit low temperature when powered by redstone.

This is smokestack.You can put it on top of an icebox or boiler, and then power boiler/icebox with redstone. It will create chill/warmth effect which should cool down or warm up your character in closed space$(br)
Smokestack effect is propagating from TOP of smokestack block. You can stack smokestacks if you want effect to propagate from different room
This is hearth. $(br)It combines room heating features of boiler and icebox. It comes with smokestack, so you don't have to place another one on top in order to make it work as a room heater/cooler.

Based on powered side hearth will emit cold or warmth effect. If you inspect block closer, you will notice blue and red spots on 4 sides of the block.(right,left = cold, back,bottom = hot) $(br)If you power it with redstone signal side marked with red dot/line hearth will emit warmth effect $(br)If you power with redstone signal side marked with blue line hearth will emit chill effect
